```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)

yelp_json <- flatten(stream_in(file("raw_data/yelp_dataset/business.json")))
yelp <- as_data_frame(yelp_json) 

yelp_coffee <- yelp %>% 
    select(-business_id) %>% 
    filter(str_detect(name, "Starbucks")) 

yelp_coffee$state %>% table()
```
